values.description: Indicates that the DAPT content represents any part of the audio programme.
values.example_usage: Dubbing, translation and hard of hearing subtitles and captions, pre- and post- production scripts

values.description: Indicates that the DAPT content represents verbal communication in the audio programme, for example, a spoken conversation.
values.example_usage: Dubbing, translation and hard of hearing subtitles and captions, pre- and post- production scripts

values.description: Indicates that the DAPT content represents a part of the audio programme corresponding to sounds that are not verbal communication, for example, significant sounds, such as a door being slammed in anger.
values.example_usage: Translation and hard of hearing subtitles and captions, pre- and post- production scripts

values.description: Indicates that the DAPT content represents any part of the visual image of the programme.
Indicates that the DAPT content represents verbal communication, within the visual image of the programme, for example, a signed conversation.
values.example_usage: Dubbing or Audio Description, translation and hard of hearing subtitles and captions, pre- and post- production scripts

values.description: Indicates that the DAPT content represents non-textual parts of the visual image of the programme, for example, a significant object in the scene.
Indicates that the DAPT content represents textual content in the visual image of the programme, for example, a signpost, a clock, a newspaper headline, an instant message etc.
A sub-type of visual.text where the text is the title of the related media.
A sub-type of visual.text where the text is a credit, e.g. the name of an actor.
A sub-type of visual.text where the text indicates the location where the content is occurring.
